Ability.Description: Increases critical hit chance while dual wielding.

Rank.Description: After successfully hitting with Swift Strike or Thread the Trees you gain an additional 3% chance to critically hit with Follow Up attacks for 6 seconds.
After successfully hitting with Swift Strike or Thread the Trees you gain an additional 6% chance to critically hit with Follow Up attacks for 6 seconds.
After successfully hitting with Swift Strike or Thread the Trees you gain an additional 9% chance to critically hit with Follow Up attacks for 6 seconds.
Physical attacks ignore 2% of the target's armor.
Physical attacks ignore 4% of the target's armor.
Physical attacks ignore 6% of the target's armor.
Physical attacks ignore 8% of the target's armor.
Physical attacks ignore 10% of the target's armor.

Increases Damage of attacks that generate Attack Points by 4%.
Increases Damage of attacks that generate Attack Points by 6%.
Increases Damage of attacks that generate Attack Points by 8%.
Increases Damage of attacks that generate Attack Points by 10%.
Unlocks the Wrist Strike ability.
Hitting with a single target Follow Up Attack grants a second strike that does 1 Physical Damage for every 12 Attack Power.
Hitting with a single target Follow Up Attack grants a second strike that does 1 Physical Damage for every 8 Attack Power.
Hitting with a single target Follow Up Attack grants a second strike that does 1 Physical Damage for every 4 Attack Power.
You gain a 50% chance of generating a second Attack Point when using a Follow Up attack.
You gain a 100% chance of generating a second Attack Point when using a Follow Up attack.
Hitting with an ability attack grants a 15% chance to increase Critical hit chance by 15% for 15 seconds.
Hitting with an ability attack grants a 30% chance to increase Critical hit chance by 15% for 15 seconds.
Hitting with an ability attack grants a 45% chance to increase Critical hit chance by 15% for 15 seconds.
Increases the duration on Fleet of Foot by 2 seconds and reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds.
Increases the duration on Fleet of Foot by 4 seconds and reduces its cooldown by 10 seconds.
Increases the duration on Fleet of Foot by 6 seconds and reduces its cooldown by 15 seconds.

Increases your chance to Parry by 2%, your Attack Power by 2%, and Weapon Contribution by 2%.
Increases your chance to Parry by 3%, your Attack Power by 3%, and Weapon Contribution by 3%.
Increases Critical Hit Damage by 2%.
Increases Critical Hit Damage by 4%.
Increases Critical Hit Damage by 6%.

Ability.Description: Incapacitate an enemy for 45 seconds. Can be active on 1 target at a time. Cannot be used in combat. Damage will remove this effect.

Rank.Description: Unlock Tranquility ability.

Ability.Description: Increases the range of Swift Strike, Setting Moon, Reaping Harvest and all Follow Up attacks by 20m for 15s.
